19#include <sys/types.h>
20
21#include <stdlib.h>
22#include <string.h>
23#include <time.h>
24
25#include "tmux.h"
26
27/*
28 * List all sessions.
29 */
30
31#define LIST_SESSIONS_TEMPLATE \
32 "#{session_name}: #{session_windows} windows " \
33 "(created #{t:session_created}) " \
34 "[#{session_width}x#{session_height}]" \
35 "#{?session_grouped, (group ,}" \
36 "#{session_group}#{?session_grouped,),}" \
37 "#{?session_attached, (attached),}"
38
39static enum cmd_retval cmd_list_sessions_exec(struct cmd *,
40 struct cmdq_item *);
41
42const struct cmd_entry cmd_list_sessions_entry = {
43 .name = "list-sessions",
44 .alias = "ls",
45
46 .args = { "F:", 0, 0 },
47 .usage = "[-F format]",
48
49 .flags = CMD_AFTERHOOK,
50 .exec = cmd_list_sessions_exec
51};
52
53static enum cmd_retval
54cmd_list_sessions_exec(struct cmd *self, struct cmdq_item *item)
55{
56 struct args *args = self->args;
57 struct session *s;
58 u_int n;
59 struct format_tree *ft;
60 const char *template;
61 char *line;
62
63 if ((template = args_get(args, 'F')) == NULL)
64 template = LIST_SESSIONS_TEMPLATE;
65
66 n = 0;
67 RB_FOREACH(s, sessions, &sessions) {
68 ft = format_create(item->client, item, FORMAT_NONE, 0);
69 format_add(ft, "line", "%u", n);
70 format_defaults(ft, NULL, s, NULL, NULL);
71
72 line = format_expand(ft, template);
73 cmdq_print(item, "%s", line);
74 free(line);
75
76 format_free(ft);
77 n++;
78 }
79
80 return (CMD_RETURN_NORMAL);
81}
82
